page.title: 08The Odcombe Over 60's Club.
page.content: The{club}was started on the first Thursday in June 1964. It was first held in the old{Village Hall}which was situated on the site where the Bungalows at{Coryate close}now stand. When it first started Mrs Annie Brooks was in charge,now Mrs Dorothy Axe is in charge. The members play {Bingo,Whist and Nap.}Sometimes they have a film show, or an interesting talk. They get three{outings}a year, and go to at least one show. The club is held once a week on Thursday afternoons from 2.30 to 4.30 and runs a Whist Drive fortnightly on Thursdays starting at 8.00pm. The club is fortunate to still have two founder members, both well over{eighty years {old.
